thread.title: BREAKING: US Appeals Court REFUSES to reinstate Donald Trump's controversial travel ban
thread.title_full: BREAKING: US Appeals Court REFUSES to reinstate Donald Trump's controversial travel ban

title: BREAKING: US Appeals Court REFUSES to reinstate Donald Trump's controversial travel ban
text:
BREAKING: US Appeals Court REFUSES to reinstate Donald Trump's controversial travel ban BREAKING: US Appeals Court REFUSES to reinstate Donald Trump's controversial travel ban THE temporary suspension of Donald Trump’s travel ban has been upheld by a US federal appeals court. PUBLISHED: 23:06,   23:41, Thu, Feb 9, 2017 GETTY The suspension of Trump's controversial ban has been upheld by a federal appeals court 
The controversial order, which restricted travel from seven Muslim-majority countries into the US, will remain suspended following the ruling on Thursday. 
The ruling means migrants from Ir­an, Ir­aq, Libya, Somalia, Su­dan, Syr­ia and Ye­men can continue to travel to the US if they have valid visas or green cards - despite the President’s executive order to stop this. 
The ruling, made by three appeal court justices in San Francisco, means the US Supreme Court is likely to determine the final outcome of the high-profile case. 
Responding to the news, President Trump tweeted: "SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE!" 
More to follow…
